  • Classes in data.representation.discrete used by data.representation.discrete 
    Class and Description
    DiscretizedDataInstance
    This class implements a discrete version of the basic data holder.
    DiscretizedDataSet
    Discretization of continuous attributes or compressed integer values yields DiscretizedDataSet instances that can be easily handled by learning algorithms such as decision trees or Bayesian methods.
